text: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go? (stylized in all caps) is the first album by American singer-songwriter Billie Eilish. It was released on March 29, 2019. == Awards == At the 2020 Grammy Awards, it won Album of the Year, Best Pop Vocal Album, and Best Engineered Album, Non-Classical. "Bad Guy" won Record of the Year and Song of the Year. == Track listing == == References == Category:2019 albums Category:Grammy Award-winning albums Category:Interscope Records albums Category:Billie Eilish
title: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?
